concept.title: Fixed and Floating Windows
concept.shortdesc: This section explains the fixed and floating FEP windows.

section.title: The fixed window
section.p: The FEP architecture does not enable FEP to negotiate with the application beneath them for division of screen area.

section.title: The floating window
section.p: To make the control of FEP window float above the application, and even above any dialogs or pop-up windows that the application launches, use the following code in the construction of control routine:
